import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Row, Col, Button, Form, FormGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { login } from '../actions/userActions' function LoginScreen({location, history}) { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const redirect = location.search ? location.search.split('=')[1] : '/' const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log('Submitted') } return (
